Dear Administraors of the app, You need to update all the job Update as soon as possible. 

 Make sure that you checked for the new applicant so that you can go through the varification and further process. 

 Also check weather the app is working efficintly or not, if found any error then contact to the database administrators.

Regularly check the app to get updated job deatils. 

 If you are new to this app , then update your profile by today, So that can give priority that you prefer. 

 If you are an existing user then you can search for job. 

 We provide you all updated job details as much as we can.

It is a Job Notification App Of Assam. 

 It Is One Of Our Forward Step Towards Making Digital Assam. 

 You will get notification just after few moment of declaring the vacancy 

 of the job by corresponding department.

1. As you Know this app Displays your Contact Information and Address and your documents to its Administrators, 

 the person who will varify all your information. 2. We only view your documnets and contact information by the purpose of varification.

 so that we will check and help you to generate an employee exchange no and get the 

 instant job(Govt, Private) notification. 3. Any Misuse of your phone number and Email address may occur from the hacker side. 

 but we can assure that no missleading or misuse of your persional , educational 

 information or your document can occur or happen from our administrators side. 4. By Accepting Terms and Condition, You are giving your consent to show your Information to app users.

 5. Developer of this app are not responsible for any misuse and spam on your mobile number and Email.
